div.p: Adverse event tracking in clinical settings and clinical research can differ. In the former case the event is tracked to meet business safety concerns and there is a strong interest in how the event was resolved. In the clinical research setting, the event is additionally tracked to be considered as a concern for the study procedure, either as a potential confounder or as a potential side-effect of the study treatment. The Vulcan accelerator project suggests two profiles for the use the Adverse Event Resource in Clinical use or Clinical Research use.
